subject: Re: Stupid but True
msgSnippet: Sorry for the mysterious  characters; I thought I saw evidence that Yahoo groups allowed fancier html than I expected. The prior posting happened to work on
messageBody:
Sorry for the mysterious characters; I thought I saw evidence that Yahoo groups allowed fancier html than I expected. The prior posting happened to work on some platforms because missing glyphs are searched for in any available font (eg ThothUni on windows). Mea culpa
Of course if you have ThothUni installed I think you'll be able to read the following on any platform:

  


--- In Read_Alphabet@yahoogroups.com, "Moira O'Brien" <mj@...> wrote:
>
> I am bemused! I tried to reply using Jerome which is installed on my
> computer, but it will not display properly here. Yet your mail is displaying
> below correctly in QS.  How did you manage to do this? I have both jerome,
> thoth and thoth unicode on my computer.
>
> Moira
>
>
